CustomField.description: For dialer integration with Touchpoint. When checked, the phone number within the Touchpoint screen/Touchpoint Component is clickable and recognized by the dialer
CustomField.formula: OR( SendToPartner__c=true ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "NSS") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "Inbound-Oasis") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "Outbound-Oasis") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "MMS SDR") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "Virtual SMB") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "SMB New Business") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "BusDev") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "PC") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "TAA") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "SMB SA") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "BPO") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "Virtual HRS") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "SMB INB") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "MS") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "MC") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "Inbound-Forms") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "Virtual HNBF") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "ASO") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "401k") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "CSSR") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "HNBF") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "CSM") ,ISPICKVAL( Cadence_Type__c , "PEO") ,$User.User_Cadence_Type__c = "Virtual SMB" )
CustomField.label: Is Telemarketing?
